## RevocableInstance interface

A revocable instance of AsyncCall().

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RevocableInstance<T> 
```

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |

|  [forceRevoke](./async-call-rpc.revocableinstance.forcerevoke.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Force stop the service, reject all pending requests (on client) and ignore the result of unfinished requests (on server) |
